Package researchsim.entities

Class Flora

  • Object
    • Entity
      • Flora
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Collectable, Encodable
    public class Flora
extends Entity
implements Collectable
    Flora is all the plant life present in a particular region or time, generally the naturally occurring (indigenous) native plants. Flora can be collected by the User.

    NOTE: Some methods in this class require interaction with the ScenarioManager. Only interact with it when you need it.

    Partially implemented in assignment 1, to be completed in assignment 2

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      Flora​(Size size, Coordinate coordinate)
      Creates a flora (plant) with a given size and coordinate.

    • Method Detail

      • getName

        public String getName()
        Returns the human-readable name of this plant. The name is determined by the following table.
        Human-readable names
        SMALL Flower
        MEDIUM Shrub
        LARGE Sapling
        GIANT Tree
        Specified by:
        getName in class Entity
        Returns:
        human-readable name
        Implemented in assignment 1

      • collect

        public int collect​(User user)
        A User interacts and collects this plant. Upon collection the following should occur:
        • A CollectEvent should be created with the plant and coordinate.
        • The Tile that the plant was occupying should now be unoccupied (empty).

        The user will gain a number of points for collecting this plant determined on its size.

        Specified by:
        collect in interface Collectable
        Parameters:
        user - the user that collects the entity.
        Returns:
        points earned
        See Also:
        Size.points
        Implement this for assignment 2
